article.title: SAIC Awarded $26 Million Task Order by Naval Surface Warfare Center-Dahlgren Division
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation has been awarded a task order by the Naval Surface Warfare Center (NSWC)- Dahlgren Division to provide NSWC Dam Neck with engineering, technical and management services. The contract has a total value of $26 million if all options are exercised.
